      Returns true if this contains the word m

      Returns an array which cut a word in two parts

      • extractBefore

        public Word[] extractBefore(char c)
        Returns an array which cut a word in two parts
        Parameters:
        c - a character
        Returns:
        an array of two words, the first is the word until the first occurrence of c, the second the rest of the word. If the character is not in the word, the first word is ""

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
